name: Mother! Protect Me!
description:
Help a mother Protect her son from monsters in his dream! This is a simple Endless Game.  Feel the story! 

New Level Everytime You Play!

Gain health every time you touch bed!

Control- Movement : Left , Right /  Jump : Left Control , Space /  Shoot : Left Click /  Story Progress : Space

Note - There are NO SOUNDS! ;)
